creator: Jarir Bookstore
descriptionHtml:
Shop from Jarir Bookstore at your convenience. Jarir Bookstore application allows you to browse products, get latest prices and promotions, and complete your purchase within the app.

Key features:
* Browse Jarir Bookstore catalogue by categrories or search.
* Check product availability at any of Jarir Bookstore showroom.
* Purchase and pay easily and safely.
* Track or view your orders details.
* Download and browse Jarir Shopping Guide and other catalgoues.
* Get directions to nearest or any Jarir Bookstore showroom.

Jarir Bookstore provides the best and recent products in:
Arabic and English Books, Electronics, Smartphones and Accessories, Computers and its supplies, Video games, Kids Development, School Supplies, Office Supplies and Arts & Crafts
descriptionShort: Now you can browse products, get latest prices & promotions, and place orders!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Now you can link your Jarir Bookstore Discount Card directly from the app and use it without having to carry the printed card with you

- You can also apply for a new Jarir Bookstore Discount Card directly from the app if you don't have one already

- We increased the number of showrooms available for order collection so now you can collect your order from any Jarir Bookstore Showroom in Saudi Arabia

- Design and performance enhancements for easier browsing and checkout

title:
Jarir Bookstore مكتبة جرير
8.4.0

creator: Jarir Bookstore
descriptionHtml:
What’s new?
Experience a sleek, user-friendly design with an amazing UI/UX and personalized recommendations for a seamless shopping journey. Enjoy smarter navigation, making it easier than ever to browse and find what you look for with intuitive categories and filters. Update now and shop better with Jarir Bookstore!
Jarir Bookstore app brings amazing new benefits to make your shopping experience smoother and more convenient. Browse our extensive catalog, view detailed product information, compare products, read reviews, and purchase your favorite items with ease. Jarir offers delivery to more than 120 countries around the globe. Whether you're shopping for books, electronics, stationary, Art and Crafts, or gifts, Jarir app ensures a smoother, more rewarding shopping experience in you mobile.

Sleek, User-Friendly Design
Our new UI/UX offers a seamless, modern shopping experience with personalized recommendations.

Seamless Navigation
Browse thousands of books, electronics, and office and school supplies with intuitive categories and smart filters—find what you need in seconds.

Convenient Delivery, Your Way
Choose home delivery, pick up from any showroom with Order & Collect, or enjoy international shipping for selected products to 120+ countries.

Get Notified When It’s Back
Register your interest in out-of-stock products, and we’ll alert you the moment they’re available.

Quick & Secure Checkout
Enjoy fast checkout with multiple payment options, including Mada, credit cards, Apple Pay, Jarir Gift Cards, and installments.

Exclusive for Jarir Discount Card
Unlock discounts, special promotions, and member-only personalized deals.

To provide a rich and personalized experience, Jarir Bookstore App may request access to certain features on your device, such as camera, microphone, notifications, Touch ID, photos, and Bluetooth. These permissions enable features like voice search, product notifications, visual search, customer reviews, and secure authentication.

Jarir Bookstore App supports Arabic and English and offers region-based shopping options for a seamless experience tailored to your location. Not all Items are available for sales and shipping to all countries.

By using this app, you agree to Jarir’s Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
If your device supports facial recognition technology, the app may use your camera to enable certain features, such as secure login. Any data processed through this feature remains on your device and is never stored, processed, or shared externally by Jarir Bookstore.
descriptionShort: Jarir Bookstore offers amazing benefits for a smoother shopping experience
